languages.text: "Кто угодно бы это сказал под дулами десятка пушек".
"Anyone would say that looking down the barrels of a dozen guns."
languages.original_text: "Кто угодно бы это сказал под дулами десятка пушек".

traits.locale_text: "Anyone would say that looking down the barrels of a dozen guns."
"Anyone would say that looking down the barrels of a dozen guns."
"Anyone would say that looking down the barrels of a dozen guns."
"Anyone would say that looking down the barrels of a dozen guns."
"Anyone would say that looking down the barrels of a dozen guns."

languages.text: “每个被几十杆枪指着的人都会这么说。”
languages.original_text: "Anyone would say that looking down the barrels of a dozen guns."

traits.locale_text: “每个被几十杆枪指着的人都会这么说。”

languages.text: «Cualquiera diría lo mismo cuando le apuntan una docena de armas».
languages.original_text: "Anyone would say that looking down the barrels of a dozen guns."

traits.locale_text: «Cualquiera diría lo mismo cuando le apuntan una docena de armas».

languages.text: 「こんだけ大量の銃が向けられてれば、誰だってそう言うわなあ」
languages.original_text: "Anyone would say that looking down the barrels of a dozen guns."

traits.locale_text: 「こんだけ大量の銃が向けられてれば、誰だってそう言うわなあ」

languages.text: "Das würden alle sagen, die in die Läufe von einem Dutzend Waffen blicken."
languages.original_text: "Anyone would say that looking down the barrels of a dozen guns."

traits.locale_text: "Das würden alle sagen, die in die Läufe von einem Dutzend Waffen blicken."

languages.text: « C'est ce que tout le monde dirait face à une dizaine de canons d'armes à feu. »
languages.original_text: "Anyone would say that looking down the barrels of a dozen guns."

traits.locale_text: « C'est ce que tout le monde dirait face à une dizaine de canons d'armes à feu. »

languages.text: "Kimin kafasına bunca silahı dayasak aynı şeyi söyler."
languages.original_text: "Anyone would say that looking down the barrels of a dozen guns."

traits.locale_text: "Kimin kafasına bunca silahı dayasak aynı şeyi söyler."
